body: I had forgotten about this one until EHCOVE recently did another Kanokon doujinshi.  I need to pull out that series and watch it again.
Amazing. What I'm about to say may be strange but I kind of admire kouta, he's such a good guy, I aspire to be like him. And chizuru is a hottie too obviously

This one is special to me. Kanokon was one of the first ecchi I have ever read. Heck, it was one of the first manga I have ever finished. And finding this years later after reading the manga is one heck of a trip. Most fanart and doujin would portray the characters really poorly, so I didn't look too much into them –heck, even the anime didn't do them justice (except for Chizuru's breasts, they were perfectly represented). This one not only nails the art but also how much passion there is in their relationship, it's all faithfully portrayed in this doujin. You might be laughing thinking "dude it's just porn", and yeah, Kanokon is no masterpiece either, but still, it's special to me.
This combined all my fetishes into one , I love it
So. Cute shota Kouta had so much sex with Minamoto-san like sweet yet so crazily that his love going so overflowing with so much baby juice.
